example[0]: I didn’t have a boyfriend till I was 17.
example[1]: The shop’s open till nine o'clock on Fridays.
definition[1]: a machine used in shops, restaurants etc for calculating the amount you have to pay, and for storing the money
definition[2]: to prepare land for growing crops
example[2]: Two armed men ordered the assistant to open the till.
example[3]: There were queues at the till.
